name: Daily Collection Report
query:
select 
	name as `Name:Link/Payment Entry:175`, 	
        if(docstatus=1,'Submitted', 'Draft') as `Document Status:Data:125`,
	letter_head as `Letter Head:Data:100`, 
	posting_date as `Date:Date:100`, 
	mode_of_payment as `Mode of Payment:Data:150`, 
        reference_no as `Cheque No:Data:100`,
	party as `Party:Link/Customer:150`,
	party_name as `Party Name:Data:150`, 
	paid_amount as `Amount:Float:100`
from 
	`tabPayment Entry` 
where 
	payment_type='Receive' 
	and posting_date>=%(from_date)s
    and posting_date<=%(to_date)s
    and docstatus >= if(%(show_draft)s='Include Draft',0,1)
    and docstatus <> 2
    and letter_head like %(let)s
    and mode_of_payment like %(mop)s
order by
    posting_date,
    mode_of_payment,
    name
